title: Cards
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

**Get Started with the GCash Card**

- [What can I do with my GCash VISA/Mastercard Card?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017730834-What-can-I-do-with-my-GCash-VISA-Mastercard-Card)
- [How can I order a GCash VISA Card?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30286702730265-How-can-I-order-a-GCash-VISA-Card)
- [Can GCash deliver my GCash Card to my location?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/21043404386585-Can-GCash-deliver-my-GCash-Card-to-my-location)
- [How do I withdraw cash using my GCash VISA/Mastercard Card?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017595494-How-do-I-withdraw-cash-using-my-GCash-VISA-Mastercard-Card)
- [GCash Card Fast FAQS](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/21907534783769-GCash-Card-Fast-FAQS)

**Use your GCash Card**

- [How can I pay using my GCash Card?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900004214883-How-can-I-pay-using-my-GCash-Card)
- [How much are the fees and transaction limits for my GCash Card?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30286810141977-How-much-are-the-fees-and-transaction-limits-for-my-GCash-Card)

**Manage your GCash Card**

- [How do I link my GCash Card to my GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/4403085039513-How-do-I-link-my-GCash-Card-to-my-GCash-account)
- [How do I reset my GCash VISA/Mastercard PIN?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30286846758297-How-do-I-reset-my-GCash-VISA-Mastercard-PIN)
- [How do I deactivate my GCash Card from my account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30286976308889-How-do-I-deactivate-my-GCash-Card-from-my-account)
- [How do I lock my GCash Card?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30286982495513-How-do-I-lock-my-GCash-Card)

**Get Help with GCash Card**

- [I can’t order a GCash Card. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30287122730009-I-can-t-order-a-GCash-Card-What-do-I-do)
- [My GCash Card has not been delivered yet after 10 days. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30287100810009-My-GCash-Card-has-not-been-delivered-yet-after-10-days-What-do-I-do)
- [I paid using my GCash Card but it's not reflecting yet. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30287118998041-I-paid-using-my-GCash-Card-but-it-s-not-reflecting-yet-What-should-I-do)
- [I can’t pay using my GCash VISA/Mastercard Card. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30287174877081-I-can-t-pay-using-my-GCash-VISA-Mastercard-Card-What-do-I-do)
- [My GCash Card is not being accepted by a merchant for payment. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30287172161305-My-GCash-Card-is-not-being-accepted-by-a-merchant-for-payment-What-do-I-do)
- [I want a refund for a purchase I made using my GCash Card](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30287224565657-I-want-a-refund-for-a-purchase-I-made-using-my-GCash-Card)
[See all 14 articles](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/30287068733721-Get-Help-with-GCash-Card)

**AMEX Virtual Pay**

- [How do I renew my AMEX Virtual Pay Card after it expires?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40802287759641-How-do-I-renew-my-AMEX-Virtual-Pay-Card-after-it-expires)
- [How do I get a new AMEX Virtual Pay Card CVV or Security Code?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40802145637145-How-do-I-get-a-new-AMEX-Virtual-Pay-Card-CVV-or-Security-Code)
- [How do I activate my AMEX Virtual Pay Card in GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017594274-How-do-I-activate-my-AMEX-Virtual-Pay-Card-in-GCash)
- [How do I pay using my AMEX Virtual Pay Card?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/4402446008345-How-do-I-pay-using-my-AMEX-Virtual-Pay-Card)
